reviewText: I enjoyed it . I liked that it was a teaching system that made sense and the method was repeatable when he taught different golf shots ie. Putting , chipping .

Phil Galvano II following in is Father's foot steps has done it again! This by far is the best short game video available. I have an extensive library of the best books and videos on Golf training. I use his Father's putting & "chipping" method in my game and teaching. After I purchased this video Short Game Magic: Golf Instruction with Phil Galvano II, PGA and watched it many times I searched further and found Phil II's video Golf Basics and purchased it.Golf Basics: Golf Instruction with Phil Galvano II, PGA Then further searching I found his Sister's book "for women" and ordered it. It is excellent also and not just for women! LADIES, GET A GRIP When it comes to Golf instruction that works you need to pay attention to the Galvano family!
